title: JAWS
synopsis: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and a grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.

title: THERE WILL BE BLOOD
synopsis: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: AN AFFAIR TO REMEMBER
synopsis: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?
